column4: is there an upgrsde channel?  i upgraded from natty to oneiric and X won't start now
.. the log looks ok.. can you do sudo service gdm start?
so.. you CAN init the X Server manually but not during boot??
can you diff the Xorg.0.log with Xorg.0.log.old?
i used "service gdm start" and it worked perfectly
is it possible it's the onboard ati card and gnome 3?
Doesnt make sense, you siad you were able to get the X Server running
not much we can do.. the Xorg log was clean as a whistle.. did you do the diff like I asked?
what does the last line mean "ddxSigGiveUp: Closing log"?
purged and re-added gdm, lightdm, and kdm... and now it is working
things like this make me glad I use arch linux.. much more stable than ubuntu :P (not to hate on ubuntu, just had bad experiences post Lucid)
